option.name: originalContent
option.value: # Dockerfile para aplicación Java FROM openjdk:24-jdk-slim WORKDIR /app COPY build/install/TPS/ ./ EXPOSE 8080 ENTRYPOINT ["sh", "-c", "./bin/TPS && tail -f /dev/null"]

option.value: # Dockerfile para aplicación Java FROM openjdk:24-jdk-slim WORKDIR /app COPY build/install/TPS/ ./ EXPOSE 8080 ENTRYPOINT ["sh", "-c", "./bin/TPS && tail -f /dev/null"]
